title: Mon Post Show (06-27-22)
itunes:title: Mon Post Show (06-27-22)
description:
Bobby got invited to play on the Name That Tune TV show. We get to the bottom of why Eddie isn’t verified on Instagram. The trailer for Bobby’s new show has also been released. Eddie, Morgan and Scuba Steve went to Nascar over the weekend and said it was awesome. Eddie got asked by a stranger if “he’s a celebrity”. Amy’s daughter flew by herself and did amazing.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Bobby got invited to play on the Name That Tune TV show. We get to the bottom of why Eddie isn’t verified on Instagram. The trailer for Bobby’s new show has also been released. Eddie, Morgan and Scuba Steve went to Nascar over the weekend and said it was awesome. Eddie got asked by a stranger if “he’s a celebrity”. Amy’s daughter flew by herself and did amazing.
